title: EpicWorldGenerator 如何在多个世界不启用?
author: qiqi1

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
例子如下：

"worldsWithDefaultWG": [
    "world",
    "world2"
  ]
复制代码

replies.author: 薯片片片片
replies.txt_content: 阅读配置文件后自行修改即可"worldsWithDefaultWG": [    "world",    "world2"  ]复制代码

replies.author: 孤独2333
replies.txt_content: config里有一个有关world的配置，在后头加上开放世界即可
